actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to classify as a wilderness area certain national forest lands adjacent to the Ventana wilderness.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of Agriculture to add specified national forest lands to the Ventana Wilderness, Los Padres National Forest, California.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to classify as a wilderness area certain national forest lands adjacent to the Ventana wilderness.
